name: cuttlebone
description: ukagaka shell renderer for web browser

scripts.build: rm -rf output/*; npm run build-coffee; npm run build-src; npm run build-test; npm run build-cat
scripts.build-cat: cat output/coffee/header.js output/coffee/NamedManager.js output/coffee/Named.js output/coffee/Scope.js output/coffee/Balloon.js output/coffee/BalloonSurface.js output/src/Shell.js output/src/Surface.js output/src/SurfaceUtil.js output/src/SurfaceRender.js output/coffee/footer.js > lib/cuttlebone.js
scripts.espower: cat output/test/test*.js > output/test/all.js; node node_modules/espower-cli/bin/cmd.js output/test/all.js > output/test/all.esp.js
scripts.update: npm update; bower update; tsd update --save --overwrite
scripts.init: npm run update; npm run build; npm run start; npm run demo;

author: Ikagaka
